page.title: 06CHRISTCHURCH QUAY
page.content: THE WATER SPORTS ON THE QUAY ARE VERY GOOD AND ENJOYABLE. THERE ARE TWO CLUBS WHICH INVOLVE GOING ON THE WATER.THE SAILING CLUB AND THE ROWING CLUB HELP PEOPLE TO DO THINGS ON THE WATER AND IN BOATS. EVERY YEAR ON CHRISTCHURCH QUAY A NIGHT CALLED REGATTA IS HELD .IT HAS RIDES AND GAMES ,THINGS TO BUY AND WIN. THERE ARE ALSO SOME FIREWORKS TO WATCH. ON THE QUAY THERE IS AN AMUSEMENTS ARCADE WITH SPACE INVADERS.THEY HAVE A PADDLING POOL, SWINGS AND A SEE-SAW.THEY ALSO HAVE PONY RIDES FOR YOUNG CHILDREN. PONTINS HOLIDAY CAMP HAS TWO HUNDRED AND TWENTY TWO CHALETS. IT HAS A SWIMMING POOL, SHOP, AMUSEMENTS, GAMES ROOM AND QUIET GARDENS FOR ADULTS ONLY. THEY HAVE A BALLROOM AND RESTAURANT.
